trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the encryption algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula o algoritmo de criptografia usado para a criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionMethod>` tag uses a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to identify the encryption algorithm that must be used to decrypt XML data.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptionMethod>` marca usa um identificador de recurso uniforme (URI) para identificar o algoritmo de criptografia deve ser usado para descriptografar os dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionMethod>` tag defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> classe encapsula o `<EncryptionMethod>` marca definida pela especificação de criptografia de XML do World Wide Web Consortium localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class to identify the encryption algorithm associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> classe para identificar o algoritmo de criptografia associado a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elemento ou o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Use um dos identificadores de URI definidos pela especificação de criptografia de XML do World Wide Web Consortium localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI são acessíveis como campos estáticos do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma classe de utilitário simples que usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> o algoritmo para criptografar um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criptografar um documento XML usando uma chave simétrica.

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo não inclui quaisquer informações de chave no documento XML criptografado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class without specifying the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> classe sem especificar o identificador de URI (Uniform Resource) de um algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class specifying an algorithm Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> especificando um URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) do algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class using the URI of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> classe usando o URI de um algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Use um dos identificadores de URI definidos pela especificação de criptografia de XML do World Wide Web Consortium localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI são acessíveis como campos estáticos do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma classe de utilitário simples que usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> o algoritmo para criptografar um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criptografar um documento XML usando uma chave simétrica.

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo não inclui quaisquer informações de chave no documento XML criptografado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que encapsula uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> que encapsula uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionMethod>` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A> método retorna uma representação de `<EncryptionMethod>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) que descreve o algoritmo a ser usado para a criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um URI Uniform Resource Identifier () que descreve o algoritmo a ser usado para criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A> property describes the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A> propriedade descreve o identificador de URI (Uniform Resource) do algoritmo de criptografia usado para criptografar dados associados a um o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elemento ou o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Use um dos identificadores de URI definidos pela especificação de criptografia de XML do World Wide Web Consortium localizado em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Todos os identificadores URI são acessíveis como campos estáticos do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the algorithm key size used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da chave do algoritmo usado para a criptografia XML.

trans-unit.source: The algorithm key size, in bits, used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo tamanho da chave, em bits, usado para criptografia de XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A> property describes the key size of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A> propriedade descreve o tamanho da chave do algoritmo de criptografia usado para criptografar dados associados a um o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elemento ou o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize" /> property was set to a value that was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize" /> estava definida com um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object to parse.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> especificado e configura o estado interno do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> a corresponder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A> método configura o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> objeto para corresponder o estado de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The key size expressed in the <paramref name="value" /> parameter was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave expresso no parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> era menor do que 0.
